about_the_game:
Multitude of uses

Cast a competitive tournament, share a hilarious moment, film machinima, or create dazzling trailers for your mod content. 

Variety of key binds exposed to Steam Input

Nearly every possible function of Pavlov TV has mapped key binds. These can be changed in Steam Input to customize to your own preferred binding map. 

Interface Options

You can choose to display the active match information, player inventory, nametags, utility trajectory trails, firearm boresight lines, and more. 

Camera effects

Included collection of camera effects you can use to alter the look of your captures such as field of view, aperture, depth of field, sensor width, focus distance, motion blur as well as a photo grid.

API for custom overlays

Pavlov TV has exposed endpoints to pull data from a match for a variety of uses, most prominently for streaming overlays such as Open Broadcaster Software. Ditch our UI and create your own. 

Mod Compatibility

Pavlov TV will automatically download mods and compatible dependencies that are published under the Windows platform

Steam Deck support

You can view matches directly from your Steam Deck.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 62 GB available space

short_description: Pavlov TV is a spectator tool for Pavlov and Pavlov Shack. View live Search & Destroy or Push lobbies, or capture replays on your community server and play them back. A full suite of UI controls as well as an API to export match data for streaming software.
